name: ares

in Greek mythology (= ancient stories), the god of war: The Greeks understood the awful pull of war so well, they sang a hymn to Ares to help them avoid it. Compare
Mars (GOD)
More examplesFewer examplesAres was the Greek god of war, but myth also made him the lover of Aphrodite.Ares was the god who presided over the emotions that lead to violence: hatred and rage. Directly ahead in the area of the central Agora the outline of the Altar of Ares and Temple of Ares can be seen.The Greek name for Mars is Ares, the god of savage war, or bloodlust.
